name: Curse of Red Woods
description:
A short quest to find the last fairy to save the forest from the curse.

Made in less than 3 days for the Mini Jam 111: Colors².

The game needs some polishing and bug fixing, but it's playable. I was struggling with the limitation of the jam. The game lacks... fun. It's just a chill experience, but I wouldn't call it a "game". Well, enjoy.
